articles.title: White nationalist convicted of beating during Charlottesville Unite the Right rally
articles.description: A white nationalist from Arkansas was convicted late Tuesday of malicious wounding in connection with beating a black man during a day of clashes at a Unite the Right rally in Charlottesville last summer.
